name: Isolated Mind
description:
Keep yourself from insanity, hunger, and death by managing your demons! This is a game where you control the angel in a person's "mind" whose job is to keep the demons in check.

INSTRUCTIONS:

When you see a demon popup, press E on it and once the dialogue finishes, press E again to remove him from the house.

A, D - Move left & right

S - Drop down from stairs

E - Interact and remove a demon
